com.drfl.twinstickshooter.model

Class TSSModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.drfl.twinstickshooter.model.TSSModel

  • public class TSSModel
extends java.lang.Object
    MVC Model, handles the underlying data that supports both the Controller and View packages.

      • createEntityModels

        public void createEntityModels(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.MapLayer entitiesLayer)
        Creates entity models from a Tiled map object layer. Object type is used to instantiate entity models (MainChar / Spawner)
        Parameters:
        entitiesLayer - Tiled map object layer containing entities

      • createBullet

        public BulletModel createBullet(EntityModel owner,
                                com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 direction)
        Creates a bullet model positioned near its owner and a certain heading.
        Parameters:
        owner - The entity who owns the bullet
        direction - The heading of the bullet
        Returns:
        The bullet model created

      • createEnemy

        public EnemyModel createEnemy(int index)
        Creates an enemy model from a spawner. Sets spawner flag so it can't spawn until an enemy dies and refreshes it.
        Parameters:
        index - The spawner index
        Returns:
        The enemy model created

      • searchSpawnIndex

        public int searchSpawnIndex()
        Tries to find an enemy spawner flagged as free.
        Returns:
        Index of random free spawner, -1 if no free spawners

      • removeBullet
